mapper.select: SELECT B.review_idx , B.tag_idx , C.tag_name FROM review_tag B , review_tag_type C WHERE B.tag_idx = C.idx AND B.store_idx = #{storeIdx} ORDER BY B.review_idx

SELECT r.*, u.*, l.like_count AS like_count FROM review r INNER JOIN ( SELECT review_idx, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM review_like GROUP BY review_idx ORDER BY like_count DESC LIMIT 1 ) l ON r.idx = l.review_idx LEFT JOIN upload_image u ON u.mapped_id = r.idx AND u.attachment_type = 'review' WHERE r.store_idx = #{storeIdx} LIMIT 1;
